subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text:
* In the historical {{w|Kangxi dictionary}}, this character is written with four strokes: {{l|mul|⿱[[⺊]]⿹[[𠃌]][[一]]}}
* In modern Japanese, the character is written slightly differently, with the final {{l|mul|一}} stroke extending across {{l|mul|㇉}}.

subSections.title: Derived characters
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|[[𠇐]], [[屿]], [[𫹮]], [[𭤰]], [[玙]], [[𪾟]], [[𨊮]], [[𮡤]], [[𫚈]], [[欤]], [[写]], [[㝍]], [[𥫣]], [[𡴃]], [[𢌱]], [[𢗓]], [[𢪓]], [[𢮠]]}}
* {{l|mul|[[𠚻]]}} ''(Exception: Only for {{w|zh:中文標準交換碼|Taiwan character form}} which contains <small>{{l|mul|⿰[[与]][[刂]]}}</small>. Mainland China {{w|zh:國家標準代碼|character form}} contains {{l|mul|⿰⿱[[𠂉]][[刁]][[刂]]}} instead)''
